description:
Executes the fit of a specified machine learning model based on training data. .

The function is generic and supports different machine learning models.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The machine learning model to be trained. This should be an instance of a model that supports the `fit` method.

parameters.name: training_set
parameters.description: The training set for the model, provided as a vector data cube. This set contains both the independent variables and the dependent variable that the model analyzes to learn patterns and relationships within the data.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The column in the training set that represents the dependent variable for model training.

returns.description: A trained model object that can be saved with `save_ml_model()` and restored with `load_ml_model()`.
